1582105711_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body:
Make sure, the target is big enough. 
I once bought a 1TB external drive to make a full clone of the 1TB SSD in my notebook.
Only after I restored my backup, I found out that the external drive was slightly smaller.
